page.title: 14HOUSES.
page.content: {Houses. }There is only one Council House in this area and no purpose built accomodation for the elderly. The majority of houses are owner occupied with three or more bedrooms, a bathroom and are fully modernised. {Amenities.}Mainswater is supplied to most houses by Severn Trent or Welsh water authorities, but a few still have their own private supplies. Midlands Electricity Board supplies power to all homes and a few are able to have Mains Gas. There is no main Sewerage System so houses have their own Septic Tanks. Most have large gardens and private drives. {Planning Permission}for new houses is strictly regulated,mostly granted for in filling or for Agriculture needs. There are very few Derelict or unoccupied houses as they have mostly been restored.
